title: /ALL Chat | 106LB DARIUS AXE

embed.description: Send us your stuff! http://bit.ly/allchatshow In this episode we check out a gigantic Darius axe, talk to cosplayer Johnny Junkers, and discuss Baron strategy.

body: /ALL Chat is back with a new episode - let us know what you think!

replies.body: ah so thats why darius is a strong pick :D
ayy lmao
is the tag line really "Is back" needed? its only episode 2.
They survived the pilot. After a thorough examination of the concept and format they're back.
It's cool stuff like this that makes me really like league, wish my client wasn't crashing on start-up so I could play
Why was the delay between episodes so huge?
Needed time to make sure the type of series/format would work and work well. Good feedback, some tweaks, and good reviews from the community and their back to stay (hopefully).
for a sec i thought my all chat was back and riot found a different punishment
people actually like this? ROFLMAO

I will ALWAYS disagree with people who say Shen is angry and looking for revenge on Zed. Zed killed Shen's father? Shen watched that same father tortured in front of him to become the Eye of Twilight. He's the least likely champion in the entire game to look for revenge, because he brings balance dispassionately. Enforced equilibrium.
I tend to agree with you.  If anything, I think should would believe that Zed is the yang to Shen's yen, representing the equilibrium that his order is taught to uphold.
I really like these and think there should be more!
very interesting keep it up!

"WHY WOULD SOMEONE PICK GA ON SORAKA!?" Well, as said in the original video, because it's on the rcommended tab.
Gj Riterino.
:^)
I think that its awesome that the guy from the T.v show did it, its really cool, i might watch that T.v show alil bit more now, of course when im not playing lol that is!
ok so i bought a hyena warwick skin and a marauder warwick skin but when ever i select marauder skin it dosent use tht 1 it use my hyena instead and now im upset cause i cant use my marauder skin :(
That axe tho. Kappa
I think they should also promote a few good League of Legends streamers on Twitch every episode.

People are so creative! That Soraka bit got my stomach in stitches. I would love to see an episode discussing all the best League of Legends YouTubers. I keep coming across new content everyday and would like to know what other hidden treasures are out there.

The part of the baron buff is a good tip. I can't tell you how many times people go for baron at the wrong times. I like to get the buff safely when there's enough vision control or a quick ace.

Awesome job on the show! Keep it coming. :)
I like it. Gives me information whcih I'm not entirely sure I need, yet has personality.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_uIWpB-vUYg
Great Show! I really liked the comment on Baron. I will totally pass that advice along!
I don't get it. 106 LeBlanc Darius axe? Someone explain please.
lb means pound, which is the imperial systems unit for weight.
Lol I hope that was a joke.
fix your game first
